title: Thirteen-A Compilation of Short Stories
description: Thirteen—A Compilation of Short Stories contains a compilation of—you’ve guessed it—thirteen freaky short stories: “Baby Doll,” “Breathless,” “The Shower Spider,” “The Unexpected Hotel Guests,” “The Disappearance,” “The Renovation Disaster,” ‘The Wounded Bird,” “The Haunted Museum,” “The Bloody Affair,” “Death Premonitions,” “An Unforgettable Trip,” “The Dog’s Warning,” and “Dead Woman Walking.”
author: Chantal Bellehumeur
